dialogue: I've read about this. It's called smartphone interface rage.
It's caused by the perfect storm of bad interface design, chubby fingers, and poor signal strength.
He'll get so frustrated that he'll consider smashing his phone.
Then he'll realize he can't survive without his phone and he'll be twice as frustrated.
Run as fast as you can into the wall! It will take your mind off of your phone!
Sometimes the best you can hope for is that the lesser of two evils is the funny one.
